primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God (Subject) moves mightily through history and creation to restore life and intercede for humanity (Object) via the Holy Spirit, independent of human effort.

subject.identificatie: The Holy Spirit / The Triune God
tekstueel_bewijs: The Spirit entered into me and set me upon my feet
God is the one with the life-giving potency
The Spirit will be poured out from on high
The wilderness becomes a fruitful field
Renewal of the face of the ground

zender.identificatie: The Triune God (The Father and the Son)
tekstueel_bewijs: Proceeding from the Father and the Son

ontvanger.identificatie: Humanity / The Hearer / The Thirsty Land
tekstueel_bewijs: I will pour my Spirit upon your descendants
The Spirit helps us in our weakness

helper.identificatie: The Holy Spirit (as the 'energy' of God)
tekstueel_bewijs: The Spirit himself intercedes for us
The Spirit helps us in our weakness

tegenstander.identificatie: Human Impotence, 'Spirituality' (as a static noun), and Sin/Death
tekstueel_bewijs: Our spirituality... just sort of sits there
We do not know how to pray as we ought
The pretense and impotence of all other so-called gods
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is not just bad habits but an ontological inability to create life or communicate with God (groaning in travail).

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: Human response to the Spirit's movement (Ethical/Political action).
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Believer / The Church
secundair_narratief_programma.object: Justice and Righteousness (e.g., Civil Rights, Climate Action)
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The secondary program is explicitly dependent on the primary; human action only occurs 'until the Spirit is poured upon us'.

voorbeelden_god_subject: God is the one with the life-giving potency.
He will pour water on the thirsty land.
voorbeelden_mens_subject: We do not know how to pray.
We watched the whole thing take place.
You are not saved by your spirituality.

voorbeelden: Each of us must discern the signs.
God is not waiting around for us to develop our spirituality.
We do not know how to pray as we ought.
God’s power alone is able to make restoration possible.
The Spirit is the power of God to set you on your feet.

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon is a 'Power' sermon. It diagnoses human 'Non-Pouvoir' (inability) and proclaims God's 'Pouvoir' (sovereign capability).

primaire_tegenstelling.niet_s2: Moralism (Human effort to fill the void)

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: Moves from ~S1 (Spirituality) to S2 (Human weakness/groaning) to S1 (The Spirit's outpouring).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: The Spirit intercedes where the human fails, bridging the gap between human silence and divine speech.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: High; the sermon emphasizes that without the Spirit, there is only thorns, briers, and desertion.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon systematically deconstructs human 'spirituality' as a valid actant, replacing it with the sovereign activity of the Holy Spirit.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: None found; the sermon explicitly rejects 'if/then' spirituality.

indicatoren_genade.indicator: God as Subject of active verbs
indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: God is a verb, and the Spirit of God is a verb.
God is going to pour out his Spirit on his people even though they clearly do not deserve it.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Biblical figures like David and Cyrus are used as examples of God's activity, not as models for imitation.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: Cyrus is an actant of God's purpose despite his ignorance; David is a mouthpiece for the Spirit.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Relief from the burden of self-generated piety.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The transition from cosmic creation to personal intercession is seamless through the actant of the Spirit.
spanning_punten: The tension between the Spirit's political movement and the individual's personal suffering.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: The Spirit intercedes for us... according to the will of God.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The Spirit provides the 'Pouvoir' (Power) that the human 'Subject' lacks.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Severe; described as 'weakness' and 'not knowing how to pray'.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is a masterclass in theocentric narrative. It successfully moves the hearer from the role of 'Subject of spirituality' to 'Receiver of the Spirit'.

modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: Maintain; this is appropriate for Pentecost.
modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: None; the balance serves the grace-orientation.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: The sermon remains consistently grace-oriented by anchoring the 'verbs' in God's character rather than human potential.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: While a rhetorical analysis might focus on the 'spirituality vs spirit' metaphor, Greimasian analysis reveals the underlying shift in agency (Subject-switch).
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Goes beyond the meaning of 'ruach' to show how 'ruach' functions as the engine of the narrative's Axis of Power.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Reveals that 'spirituality' is treated as a 'false helper' (Opponent) that masquerades as a Subject.

appendices.notities: The sermon explicitly uses the word 'verb' to describe God, making it a perfect candidate for actantial analysis.
